Article Title: 'India should not be inspired by US': IAF chief warns against rushing theatre commands; proposes joint planning hub to gear up for future wars
Article Text:
Air Chief Marshal Ap Singh (IAF)

IAF Workhorse MiG-21 Makes Last Sorties At Nal Ahead Of Sept 26 Chandigarh Farewell

NEW DELHI: Air Chief Marshal A P Singh on Tuesday cautioned against rushing the rollout of theatre commands, stressing that India must adopt its own model instead of copying others. He suggested setting up a joint planning and coordination centre in Delhi, under the Chiefs of Staff Committee, to prepare for "future wars."Speaking at the Army War College, the Chief of Air Staff, cautioned against rushing into the creation of new theatre commands, warning that creating a new structure while disrupting everything is not a very good idea at this point of time.Instead, he proposed setting up a joint planning and coordination centre in Delhi, placed under the Chiefs of Staff Committee, to issue directions jointly saying, "I personally feel that having a joint planning and coordination centre in Delhi is what is required."Responding to questions on the proposed theatre commands, Singh said, "yes, we can start with this first, implement it and see how it pans out. If we need any more structure, we can think about it. But disrupting everything and making one structure now at this time, I do not think it is a very good idea."The Air Chief Marshal's remarks came three-and-a-half months after Operation Sindoor, which showcased strong coordination among the Army, Navy and Air Force.Citing the recent Operation Sindoor, a tri-service simulation held from May 7 to 10 against Pakistan, Singh underlined how the three service chiefs worked closely in planning and execution.The exercise, he said, reinforced both the primacy of air power and the value of coordination. He further noted that "centrally planned" decisions could still be executed in a decentralised framework, which in his view "will work out the best."He also cautioned against blindly following international models saying India should not be inspired by any other country, like the US, in rolling out theatre commands, stressing that the nation must design a framework suited to its own requirements."Everybody has their own requirements. We need to think about what we need there, and then only we should go about it. Otherwise, we will go wrong," he said."We should not just come under any pressure and say we have to implement it now. Somehow, we have to do it. It should not be done this way. I think we can stand our ground and discuss things," he added.The Air Force chief also underlined the need to focus on preparing for tomorrow's wars, where clarity in the chain of command will be critical."You cannot have a theatre commander sitting somewhere... now whom they talk to, where do they get directions from. Phones are available but generally that does not work like that," he said."I feel having joint planning and coordination at the apex level is what is required. If directions go from it, things will work out. We don't actually need another structure at the lower level," Singh added.The government’s proposed theaterisation model aims to bring the three services under unified commands to better integrate capabilities and use resources more effectively.Under the plan, each theatre command would combine units of the Army, Navy and Air Force to handle security challenges in a specific region. Currently, the three services operate under separate commands.
Article Summary: Air chief marshal a p singh on tuesday cautioned against rushing the rollout of theatre commands. He suggested setting up a joint planning and coordination centre in delhi, under the chiefs of staff committee. The government’s proposed theaterisation model aims to bring the three services under unified commands.

Article Title: No high power 5G antennae near runways as DoT issues safety guidelines based on DGCA recco
Article Text:
AI image

.

New Delhi: Govt Tuesday directed telecommunications service providers (TSP) to “implement exclusion zones in and around airports for installation and operation of C band 5G international mobile telecom stations” to avoid potentially catastrophic interference from 5G signals to aircraft systems — including radio altimeters that measure a plane’s aircraft's height above the terrain directly below it. This essentially means TSPs will have to install low power 5G antennae near runways to avoid string signals causing interference with aircraft systems.The Union aviation ministry and the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) had last Nov suggested revised exclusion zones for ensuring safe landings and take offs. “The matter has been under deliberation of the department of telecommunications (DoT), civil aviation (ministry or MoCA) and DGCA.. the revised exclusion zones recommended (by) MoCA have been agreed as an interim measure till the upgradation or retrofitting of radio altimeters,” a DoT order issued Tuesday said.People in the know said aviation agencies in India had objected to rollout of 5G near airports due to aviation safety reasons. A radio altimeter giving a wrong reading can even lead to a crash. A paper by Boeing titled “5G radio altimeter interference” says: “Governments around the world are implementing 5G cellular systems in frequency ranges adjacent to or near the radio frequency band used by radio altimeters.The aviation industry and aviation regulators are concerned these 5G deployments will cause interference to radio altimeters… Concerns are based on a study done by industry and the US Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) (which) concluded 5G transmissions can interfere with radio altimeters. ” As a result of this study, alerts for 5G interference were issued by the Civil Aviation Authorities of France, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Czech Republic, Saudi Arabia, Oman and UAE.Several advanced countries have safeguards for this with rules from the US Federal Aviation Administration and the European and European Union Aviation Safety Agency. India will also have similar safeguards and as an interim measure there will not be high powered 5G antennae near runways,” they said.The aviation authorities in India suggested an “envelope” near runways and prescribed the minimum distance at which certain low powered 5G antennae can be installed. The DoT order issued Tuesday to Bharti Airtel, Reliance Jio, Vodafone and BSNL added, “Hence, (an earlier) DoT letter is suppressed and the exclusion zones (no C band and buffer zones) stands revised. TSPs are permitted to install and operate C band 5G/IMT services in frequency band 3300- 3670 MHz in and around airport areas as per the revised exclusion zone and technical conditions. ”
Article Summary: Govt tuesday directed telecommunications service providers to “implement exclusion zones in and around airports for installation and operation of c band 5g international mobile telecom stations” this essentially means tsps will have to install low power 5g antennae near runways to avoid string signals causing interference with aircraft systems.

Article Title: India likely to sign USD one billion fighter jet engine deal with American firm GE by September
Article Text:
ANI image

IAF Workhorse MiG-21 Makes Last Sorties At Nal Ahead Of Sept 26 Chandigarh Farewell

NEW DELHI: Soon after the Centre cleared a Rs 62,000 crore deal to buy 97 more LCA Mark 1A fighter aircraft, India is close to signing a deal of around USD one billion with the American firm GE for supplying 113 more GE-404 engines for the indigenous combat aircraft.Indian state-owned firm Hindustan Aeronautics Limited has already inked a deal for 99 GE-404 engines with the American firm for the initial 83 LCA Mark 1A fighter jets ordered by the Indian Air Force and these 113 would be in addition to that.The negotiations are almost finalised for buying 113 more GE-404 engines from the American firm GE for the 97 LCAs. The deal is likely to be finalised by September this year, defence officials told ANI.The deal is expected to help HAL to get its complete requirement of 212 GE-404 engines in continuity, avoiding any types of delays in engine supplies.The HAL is working to supply the first 83 aircraft by the end of 2029-30 and the next batch of 97 LCA Mark 1As by 2033-34, they said.American GE is expected to supply two engines per month from now on to fulfill its commitment for the Indian programme.The HAL is also negotiating a deal with GE for buying its GE-414 engines with 80 per cent transfer of technology.The Indian side requires 200 GE-414 engines for its LCA Mark 2 and Advanced Medium Combat Aircraft (AMCA).The around USD 1.5 billion deal is likely to be signed in the next few months, and negotiations for it have been going on for a long time now, the officials said.The Indian side requires 162 engines for the LCA Mark 2 aircraft and 10 others for the five prototypes of the AMCA.The programme will help the IAF to replace its fleet of MiG-21s, which are finally being phased out by the government in the next few weeks.The indigenous fighter jet project is fully backed by the Defence Ministry, and Air Headquarters and is set to be a big boost for promoting indigenisation as well as give major business to the small and medium enterprises engaged in defence business across the country, defence officials said.India is already working on an indigenous fighter aircraft engine project and will be working with the French firm Safran for it.India aims to achieve self-reliance in the defence sector through indigenisation and is also acquiring technologies from various global sources.
Article Summary: Indian state-owned firm hindustan aeronautics limited has already inked a deal for 99 ge-404 engines for the initial 83 lca mark 1a fighter jets. The negotiations are almost finalised for buying 113 more ge- 404 engines from the american firm ge for the 97 lcas. The deal is likely to be finalised by september this year, defence officials said.

Article Title: Amid Trump tariffs, PM calls for 'Mission manufacturing'
Article Text:
.

Hansalpur: PM Narendra Modi Tuesday said India was prioritising 'Mission Manufacturing' that aimed to make local production more efficient and globally competitive, adding the focus would be on strengthening ease of doing business and building capacity in "futuristic industries" such as semiconductors and rare earth magnets."India is working to make its manufacturing sector efficient and globally competitive. Industrial corridors are being developed to support this vision as well as plug-and-play infrastructure and logistics parks are being established across the country... manufacturers in several sectors are being provided benefits under the production linked incentive scheme," he said in Gujarat while flagging off Suzuki Motor and Maruti's first EV.Modi said the Centre and the states needed to focus on reforms to attract investors. He said past reforms gave an impetus in sectors such as electronics and defence. "These reforms have made it easier for investors to invest in Indian manufacturing... In this decade alone, electronics production in India has increased by nearly 500% (and) mobile phone production has surged by up to 2,700% while defence production has witnessed a growth of over 200%.The PM said states should compete on ushering reforms to attract new investments.Laying out a roadmap for India's industrial growth and its global stride, Modi said the goal should be to build on efficiencies, apart from a focus on engaging in cutting-edge technologies. "India will not stop here; in sectors where India has performed well, the goal is to achieve even greater excellence," he said."India's focus will now shift towards futuristic industries," Modi said, talking about the strides in the semiconductor industry.The PM also said govt was "attentive to the challenges" faced by the auto industry due to shortages of rare earth magnets. "To strengthen national capabilities in this area, we have the National Critical Mineral Mission. Under this mission, over 1,200 exploratory campaigns will be conducted across various locations in India to identify critical minerals."Modi said the Suzuki eVitara would be exported to over 100 countries and emerge as a showcase project for the country's global manufacturing prowess. "A new chapter is being added to India's ' Make in India ' journey. This marks a significant leap towards the shared goal of 'Make in India, Make for the World'," he said.
Article Summary: Modi said the centre and the states needed to focus on reforms to attract investors. He said past reforms gave an impetus in sectors such as electronics and defence. The pm also said govt was "attentive to the challenges" faced by the auto industry.

Article Title: What is Taylor Swift's Net Worth in 2025? Financial Status of Travis Kelce's Fiance you need to know
Article Text:
What is Taylor Swift's Net Worth in 2025? Financial Status of Travis Kelce's Fiance you need to know (Image Via Google)

Taylor Swift net worth 2025 : the rise of her fortune

Taylor Swift salary and how much she earns from music

Taylor Swift endorsements, ads, and brand deals



Also Read:

Taylor Swift houses, properties, and donations

Taylor Swift, the global pop star and fiancée of Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, is now officially a billionaire. As of August 2025, Forbes says her net worth stands at $1.6 billion. From selling out stadiums on her record-breaking Eras Tour to topping charts with her re-recorded albums, she has built her fortune only through music and touring. Let’s take a look at how she makes and spends her money.Taylor Swift’s net worth is $1.6 billion in 2025. That’s the most for any female musician. She got that big number only from singing, songwriting, and touring, no big business deals needed.Her music collection is worth about $600 million, and her tour and earnings from music add another $800 million. She also owns homes worth $110 million. She has eight homes across the country and a growing list of albums.Taylor makes lots from her Eras Tour. The tour made over $2 billion worldwide, and she earned a big part of it.She also owns the rights to her old songs now. In May 2025, she bought back her original recordings called masters, paying around $360 million. That means she gets all the money when others play her music.Taylor Swift doesn’t make a ton from brand deals or ads. She didn’t have makeup or clothes lines like other stars.So most of her income is really from her music and concerts, not from endorsements.Taylor has eight beautiful homes in different states, including Nashville, New York, Beverly Hills, and Rhode Island that together are worth over $150 million.She also gives money to help others. She has given over $50 million in bonuses to the people who helped her run her big tour like dancers and tech teams.She has also donated to food banks, disaster relief, and causes like education and helping those affected by violence.Taylor Swift is worth $1.6 billion. She earns most of her money from her music and tours, not from ads. She owns her music now and beautiful homes, and she’s very kind with her money, giving big help to others.
Article Summary: Taylor swift earns most of her money from her music and tours, not from ads. She owns her music now and beautiful homes, and she’s very kind with her money, giving big help to others. She has given over $50 million in bonuses to the people who helped her run her big tour.

Article Title: “If it ain’t white, it ain’t right”: Hailee Steinfeld’s dream wedding with Josh Allen clouded by resurfaced racial slur controversy
Article Text:
Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld (Imagn Images)

The resurfaced tweets and Josh Allen’s apology



The road forward for Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld

Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld’s marriage was expected to be one of the most glamorous celebrity-athlete unions of the year. Their wedding photos painted a picture of a fairytale romance — but celebrations quickly collided with controversy. Old tweets from Allen’s teenage years resurfaced, sparking renewed debate about accountability, personal growth, and how much the past should define public figures.Among the most damaging posts was the statement: “If it ain’t white, it ain’t right.” The tweets, made when Allen was 14 or 15, initially resurfaced back in 2018 but gained traction again during the wedding.Allen had already apologized to ESPN, saying: “I’m in a panic…I apologize for what I did… That is not who I am.” He explained that some tweets were immature attempts to mimic lyrics or jokes, while others may have come from friends using his phone. Still, the phrasing and tone stirred backlash.Fans and analysts remain split. Some argue the quarterback should not be endlessly punished for mistakes made as a teenager, especially after public apologies and years of clean conduct. Others believe that such comments reveal underlying attitudes that demand more direct confrontation.Within the NFL , several teammates have spoken up for Allen’s character, noting that his actions as a leader show growth, while critics caution against excusing harmful words simply because of athletic talent.For Allen and Steinfeld, this controversy tests how they will navigate scrutiny as a high-profile couple. Many believe the quarterback has an opportunity to go beyond apologies — using his platform to promote dialogue, education, and anti-racism initiatives.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld stuns fans in chocolate brown leather outfit as Josh Allen prepares for the NFL season If handled thoughtfully, the couple could turn a negative moment into one that underscores accountability and maturity, reshaping the narrative around their wedding.
Article Summary: Josh allen and hailee steinfeld's wedding quickly collided with controversy. Old tweets from allen’s teenage years resurfaced, sparking renewed debate. Some argue the quarterback should not be endlessly punished for mistakes made as a teenager. If handled thoughtfully, the couple could turn a negative moment into one that underscores accountability.

Article Title: “Taylor Swift fans in doggy”: Antonio Brown mocks Swifties with crude meme sparking online outrage
Article Text:
Antonio Brown - Taylor Swift (Getty Images)

Antonio Brown’s meme takes aim at Swifties in a provocative way

Why this controversy reveals more about fandom and celebrity culture



Antonio Brown has once again turned to social media to make headlines, this time by mocking Taylor Swift ’s loyal fanbase. Known as one of the NFL ’s most controversial figures, Brown thrives on provocation, and his latest post has reignited conversations about how athletes use shock value to stay relevant in the cultural spotlight.The former wide receiver, Antonio Brown shared a meme that showed a woman on all fours with the caption, “taylor swift fans in doggy.” While short and seemingly random, the post was an unmistakable jab at Taylor Swift’s supporters. Instead of a clever critique, the meme reduces an entire fan community to an insulting punchline, one clearly designed to provoke both laughter and outrage.For Brown, this kind of online performance isn’t new. Over the years, he has used social media as a stage for antics that range from mocking rivals to taking aim at celebrities. The Swift meme fits the same pattern: a crude joke that guarantees immediate engagement. By making Swift’s massive fandom the subject, he ensures an avalanche of reactions — whether it’s fans defending their idol or critics condemning the disrespect.Beyond the insult, Brown’s post speaks to a larger cultural reality. Fandoms like Swift’s are not just casual music listeners; they are powerful online cAntonio Brown has once again turned to social media to make headlines, this time by mocking Taylor Swift’s loyal fanbase.Known as one of the NFL’s most controversial figures, Brown thrives on provocation, and his latest post has reignited conversations about how athletes use shock value to stay relevant in the cultural spotlight.Also Read: “I’m never going to…”: Taylor Swift shuts down wedding rumors with Travis Kelce as she sets clear Easter egg rule Whether seen as comedy or cheap provocation, Antonio Brown’s meme illustrates the way athletes and celebrities weaponize social media. One image and a single line can spark a viral storm, keeping the spotlight firmly on the one who posted it.
Article Summary: The former wide receiver, antonio brown shared a meme that showed a woman on all fours with the caption, “taylor swift fans in doggy.” while short and seemingly random, the post was an unmistakable jab at taylor swift’s supporters. Brown has used social media as a stage for antics that range from mocking rivals to taking aim at celebrities.

Article Title: Travis Kelce’s Dating History: From Kayla Nicole to Taylor Swift
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s big day (Image via: Instagram)

Travis Kelce’s first reality romance with Maya Benberry (2016)



Catching Kelce

His longest relationship with Kayla Nicole (2017–2022)



Zuri Hall (late 2022–early 2023)

The Taylor Swift era begins (2023–present)



Eras Tour

Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce is officially off the market. On August 27, 2025, Travis Kelce popped the question to Taylor Swift with a dazzling engagement ring estimated to be worth nearly $1 million, marking one of the biggest celebrity proposal stories of the year. But while the NFL star and global pop icon are now preparing for their future together, Travis Kelce’s road to love wasn’t always this glamorous. Before Taylor Swift, he was already quite popular among the ladies, from reality TV drama to long-term romances. Let’s rewind through his dating timeline before he found “the one.”Travis Kelce’s love life first hit the spotlight in 2016 when he starred in the E! reality dating show. Out of 50 contestants, he chose Maya Benberry as the winner. Their romance, however, didn’t last long just a few months after the cameras stopped rolling, the couple went their separate ways.The split wasn’t exactly quiet either. Maya Benberry later hinted in interviews that Travis Kelce might not have been faithful, sparking headlines and early chatter about his bachelor lifestyle. Still, the show gave Travis Kelce national recognition beyond the NFL and set the stage for his future fame.In 2017, Travis Kelce began dating sports broadcaster and influencer Kayla Nicole. This turned out to be his most serious relationship before Taylor Swift, lasting nearly five years. The couple made countless red carpet appearances, social media posts, and even breakups and reconciliations that kept fans guessing.Rumors swirled that money disputes and cheating accusations played a role in their rocky timeline, though both Travis Kelce and Kayla Nicole kept the details vague. By 2022, the relationship had ended for good, leaving fans speculating about why things didn’t work out.Entertainment reporter Zuri Hall was linked to Travis Kelce after sightings in his VIP suite and some public proximity. The connection was never formally confirmed by either side.The pairing quietly fizzled, Travis Kelce later described himself as single around that period. There were no public allegations or drama, just an unverified, short-lived link that didn’t turn into a relationship.Travis Kelce’s love life took a fairytale turn in 2023 when he publicly admitted he tried to give Taylor Swift his number on a friendship bracelet during one of herconcerts. That bold move eventually led to Taylor Swift attending a Kansas City Chiefs game, instantly sending the internet into meltdown.From there, the two quickly became the most-watched couple in the world. Their every outing from NFL suites with Swift’s celebrity squad to Kelce flying overseas for Taylor’s concerts became viral moments. Despite massive media attention, the couple stayed strong through playoff chaos, the Super Bowl spotlight, and nonstop public speculation.And now, in 2025, Travis Kelce has taken the ultimate step by proposing with a nearly million-dollar diamond ring, officially locking in his future with the global superstar.Looking back, Travis Kelce’s dating history feels like a journey that led him right here. From a reality show experiment to a long-term love, and now to a fairytale engagement with Taylor Swift, his story has played out in the public eye every step of the way.But today, all the drama and speculation finally took a back seat. Travis Kelce isn’t just the NFL’s star tight end anymore, he’s about to be Taylor Swift’s husband.Also read - How Much Does Taylor Swift’s Engagement Ring Cost? All We Know About Travis Kelce’s Engagement Surprise
Article Summary: Travis kelce popped the question to taylor swift on august 27, 2025. The nfl star and global pop icon are now preparing for their future together. But travis kelce's road to love wasn't always this glamorous. Let's rewind through his dating timeline before he found “the one”

Article Title: Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes' net worth and lifestyle: Properties, luxury, personal life, and more
Article Text:
(Image via X)

Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes' net worth

How did Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes meet?

Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes' luxurious lifestyle

Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes' family

Also Read

WWE’s Undisputed Champion Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes are one of the most popular couples in the wrestling industry. Cody has established himself as a prominent wrestler of contemporary times; on the other hand, his wife, Brandi Rhodes, has made a name for herself as a manager, ring announcer, and backstage interviewer. The wrestling couple of WWE will complete 12 years of their marriage in September. Let’s take a look at the net worth, lifestyle, properties, personal life, and more of the couple.As of 2025, Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes have an impressive combined net worth of about $15 million, showcasing the success they've achieved both in and out of the wrestling world. Cody, who is currently one of WWE’s biggest stars, is responsible for roughly $8 million of that total, thanks to his lucrative WWE contract, which includes an annual salary of around $3 million, along with extra income from endorsements and merchandise sales.Brandi, a former wrestler, television personality, and entrepreneur, is estimated to have a net worth of about $7 million. She earns from several contributions to wrestling, media, and her various business ventures. Together, this dynamic couple has created a remarkable empire, extending into business and entertainment, ensuring their financial future is secure.Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes met during their wrestling years, and Cody met her with the help of his father.Cody and Brandi crossed paths and began dating that same year. In a previous interview, Brandi claimed that on their third date, she fell in love with Cody. Their romance also appeared on TV because they began dating when they were performing together in wrestling. Only a year after they first started dating, in November 2012, the pair engaged, and two years later, in September 2013, Brandi and Cody got married.Cody Rhodes has been residing with his wife and daughter in Chavel, Florida, since 2018. Reports suggest that this house is valued at $500,000, but the exact value is unknown. It’s believed that he owns other properties too, but the details about those properties are currently unavailable. Moreover, Cody Rhodes also happens to be a car aficionado. He owns several high-end vehicles, which he often uses to travel, especially with his family. His car collection includes a Lamborghini Urus, a Mercedes G-Wagon, a Porsche Panamera, and a Rolls-Royce Phantom.Brandi and Cody Rhodes’ relationship began in 2011 while they were both part of WWE. After dating for a little over a year, they tied the knot on September 12, 2013, and celebrated their wedding at the Swan House, located within the Atlanta History Center. Following their marriage, Brandi and Cody Rhodes welcomed their first child, a daughter named Liberty Iris, in mid-2021. They revealed the pregnancy in late 2020, and Liberty was born on June 18, 2021.
Article Summary: Cody rhodes and brandi rhodes have a combined net worth of about $15 million. Cody is responsible for roughly $8 million of that total, thanks to his lucrative wwe contract. Brandi earns from several contributions to wrestling, media, and her various business ventures.

Article Title: “They're already married”: Carly Pearce drops bombshell theory that Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce tied the knot in secret
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce (Getty Images)

Why Carly Pearce thinks Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are “already married”

A relationship built on compatibility and shared values

Carly Pearce didn’t hold back when chatting with “Extra” about why she’s so excited for Taylor Swift’s next chapter — and why, in her mind, Taylor and Travis Kelce may already be a married couple in spirit. Speaking during her fifth year co-hosting the 18th ACM Honors alongside Russell Dickerson in Nashville, Pearce mixed pop-culture curiosity with genuine industry gratitude.Carly’s fandom is obvious: “I love Taylor Swift. Are you kidding? I feel like everyone loves Taylor Swift. She's amazing… I can't wait to hear these songs.” That enthusiasm bled into relationship talk when she added, “I think they're already married. That's my theory… I think they might be… They should be. They seem very happy.” Pearce’s comments tap into a wider cultural fascination with Swift’s life — and with how public relationships influence an artist’s music and business trajectory.Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce may not be engaged just yet, but those close to the couple believe they are heading in that direction. After spending much of the spring and summer together away from the spotlight, sources say the pair has become more certain about what they want for their future.An insider revealed that the two are “on the same page [about settling down],” adding, “They want to be married and have kids in the future.They’re both genuinely ready for that chapter.” This time away from the public eye seems to have deepened their connection, with another source noting, “This time together solidified Taylor knowing that she wants to be with Travis forever.”Their relationship thrives on mutual gestures of affection, like love notes and sentimental gifts, something Swift reportedly never experienced before Kelce. “Travis has the best personality. Taylor thinks he’s hilarious and is never bored with him,” one source said.Also Read: Taylor Swift’s secretive feature film leaves fans guessing — and why Travis Kelce won’t be in it Even on their joint appearance on New Heights, Kelce called himself “the luckiest man in the world,” while Swift described him as “a human exclamation point.” With a balance of humor, empathy, and shared ambition, Swift and Kelce appear to be embracing not just a romance but a long-term partnership.Swifties finally got the moment they’ve been waiting for: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are officially engaged. The pair shared the big news on Instagram Tuesday, posting a playful caption that read, “Your English teacher and your gym teacher are getting married.”
Article Summary: Carly pearce says she thinks taylor swift and travis kelce are already married. She made the comments while co-hosting the 18th acm honors in nashville. Sources say the two are on the same page about settling down.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant joins a sea of millions to congratulate Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce on their engagement
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce (Image via Instagram)

Vanessa Bryant congratulated Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce on her engagement

From Friendship bands to an engagement ring - it's come full circle

Tuesday just got better for probably the first time ever, as Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce announced their engagement. Their love story, which took the world of both sports and entertainment by storm, is now looking to get settled. And just like her lyrics the engagement photos and the couple in them looked absolutely 'Gorgeous. 'Celebrities from all around the world are sending their congratulations to Swift and Kelce, while Swifties are just about losing it on the internet. NBA legend Kobe Bryant's widow, Vanessa Bryant, has also congratulated the couple on their upcoming nuptials, as she joins millions of people in celebrating this engagement.Everyone's favorite English teacher and Gym teacher are engaged, and the internet is in complete chaos. Not just Swifties, NFL fans, and even celebrities are all over the recent engagement news. And Vanessa Bryant has also joined thousands of people, and Paddington Bear, in congratulating the newly engaged couple.She reposted Swift and Kelce's engagement post from their Instagram account on her story with a simple caption reading "Congrats!" while Swift's 'Love Story' played in the background.She also tagged both Swift and Kelce in the post, showing her love to both the singing sensation and the NFL star player.The love story of Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce started with a friendship band the latter had taken to give to his now fiancée, while he attended a concert of hers. Although he was unsuccessful in his attempt and shared it on his New Heights podcast, it has been a whirlwind romance since the couple started dating.Cut to now, and the couple is engaged. And to make it even more dreamy, their venue was a "special place" for the couple that was turned into a flower paradise for the occasion. Kelce got his Lady love an old mine brilliant-cut diamond, designed by Kindred Lubeck of Artifex Fine Jewellery - a renowned artisan jeweler. The diamond is set on a gold band that matches the Cartier watch Swift is seen wearing in the photos. From a friendship band to an antique ring, things have finally come full circle for the lovely couple.Also Read: Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce celebrate record breaking success after Taylor Swift joins their podcast
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant congratulated taylor swift and travis kelce on her engagement. Nba legend kobe bryant's widow, vanessa bryant, has also congratulated the couple on their upcoming nuptials. From a friendship band to an antique ring, things have finally come full circle for the lovely couple.

Article Title: Elon Musk's xAI sues Apple and OpenAI over AI competition; here's what lawsuit says
Article Text:
Elon Musk angry over ChatGPT's integration in iPhones

Elon Musk is suing Apple and OpenAI, claiming that they have an anti-competitive arrangement that gives OpenAI's ChatGPT an unfair advantage on the iPhone. The lawsuit, filed in federal court in Fort Worth, Texas, on behalf of Musk's companies X and xAI, seeks billions of dollars in damages. The suit argues that Apple's integration of OpenAI into its iOS operating system hinders competition and innovation in the AI industry and limits consumer choice.The lawsuit asserts that Apple's partnership with OpenAI makes it nearly impossible for other chatbot makers, including Musk's own Grok, to reach the top of the App Store charts. The legal action sets the stage for a major courtroom battle between Musk, one of the world's richest individuals, and Apple, one of the world's most valuable companies.The lawsuit follows Elon Musk's recent social media posts in which he questioned whether Apple was "playing politics" by not promoting his products. Apple responded that its App Store is "fair and free of bias," while OpenAI CEO Sam Altman suggested Musk's complaints were a result of his own management style at X.Apple's collaboration with OpenAI involves integrating the most-downloaded free iPhone app in the U.S., ChatGPT, into its latest iPhones. The lawsuit claims this "exclusive arrangement" has made ChatGPT "the only generative AI chatbot integrated into the iPhone," and that the companies have "locked up markets to maintain their monopolies and prevent innovators like X and xAI from competing."An OpenAI spokesperson called the lawsuit "consistent with Mr. Musk’s ongoing pattern of harassment." Apple has not yet commented on the lawsuit.This is not the first time Apple has faced legal challenges over its App Store. The company has a history of tangling with regulators and companies like Epic Games over claims its app store illegally squelches competition. The allegations in Elon Musk's lawsuit also mirror those brought by the U.S. Justice Department, which sued Apple in March 2023 for allegedly monopolizing the smartphone market. The government's suit claimed Apple used its power to block "super apps" that would make it easier for consumers to switch phones, an argument similar to Musk's claim that Apple's conduct inhibits the growth of "everything apps" like X.In addition to monetary damages, Elon Musk's lawsuit seeks a court order to end the alleged "illegal arrangement."However, the nature of Apple's deal with OpenAI is a point of contention. In court testimony from an unrelated case, Apple's senior vice president of services, Eddy Cue, said the partnership is non-exclusive and Apple is free to integrate other AI apps.
Article Summary: Elon musk is suing apple and openai, claiming that they have an anti-competitive arrangement. The lawsuit, filed in federal court in fort worth, texas, seeks billions of dollars in damages. The legal action sets the stage for a major courtroom battle between musk, one of the world's richest individuals, and apple.

Article Title: When Steve Jobs, who hated getting photographed, called a photo ‘best picture ever taken of me’
Article Text:
A portrait of conviction



Apple founder Steve Jobs lived by the rule that God is in details



In a proof of power of a single image and the story behind the iconic portrait of Apple co-founder Setev Jobs highlights that how a competent photographer won over the famously camera-shy Jobs. In the year 2006, a Scottish photographer Albert Watson was given the task of capturing a portrait of Apple co-founder Steve Jobs for a magazine. Jobs was known for his camera-shy personality and he also disliked photo sessions. However, the portrait captured by Watson later became iconic and Jobs himself described it as ‘maybe the best picture ever taken of me.’ As reported by Bezinga, commissioned for a magazine feature, was scheduled for 9 a.m. sharp. Jobs arrived at 8:59 a.m., punctual and businesslike. Watson was warned in advance that ‘Jobs hated photographers’. When Watson met Jobs he said, ‘I believe I have you for an hour, but I think I can get this done in half an hour.” Jobs, visibly relieved, replied, “Oh, my god, that would be great. I’ve got so much to do today.”In order to capture the perfect photograph, Watson approached the shoot with minimalist precision. He used a white background, clean lighting and selected passport-style composition. Watson also instructed Jobs to lean a bit forward, imagining himself to be sitting across a table with someone who disagrees with him, but knowing that he was right. Jobs responded with characteristic wit: “Easy for me, I do that every day.”The photo session lasted for about 20 minutes and after seeing the Polaroid, Jobs reportedly said “That’s maybe the best picture ever taken of me.”Years after capturing the perfect portrait of Steve Jobs, Watson received a call from California requesting the photo again. On the same evening he got to know that Jobs has passed away on October 5, 2011 after this battle with pancreatic cancer. Apple then used the same portrait to pay tribute on its homepage. Since then the portrait has become a visual symbol of Jobs’ legacy.Apple founder Steve Jobs believed and lived by a simple rule which clearly defines his successful career, “God is in the details." As per biographer Walter Isaacon, Jobs spent ‘hours after hours’ obsessing over the smallest of design elements, driven by a belief that ‘God is in the details’. It is believed that this philosophy of Jobs has shaped Apple’s DNA and it still continues to be the culture at the company.
Article Summary: A scottish photographer albert watson was given the task of capturing a portrait of apple co-founder steve jobs for a magazine. Watson was warned in advance that ‘jobs hated photographers’ the portrait captured by watson later became iconic and jobs himself described it as ‘maybe the best picture ever taken of me’

Article Title: Banned Betting Apps India: Online gaming bill: 5 apps banned in 2025 for promoting gambling activities
Article Text:
Apps banned in 2025



App Name Reason Winaura Unauthorized gambling platform

Winstler42 Violation of gambling regulations Casinohermes Unregulated gambling platform Amunra1 Unlicensed gambling activities Polymarket Non-compliance with financial regulations



Betting and gaming apps banned in 2023

App Name Reason Betway Violation of local laws MELBET Unauthorized operations AndarBahar Poker Promoted illegal gambling Silver Luck Unregulated casino games Big Winner Misleading advertisements Betfair Live Line Non-compliance with laws Zodiac Casino Unlicensed gambling SuperDraft Sportsbook Offshore betting operations Betstamp Illegal financial betting Live Blackjack Unregulated casino games Onside Sports Violation of betting rules Fun88 Unlicensed operations Betindi Promoted illegal betting PokerStars Breach of Online Gaming Laws Live Baccarat Unlicensed casino games Jackpot City Casino Offshore gambling activities Spin Casino Unauthorized operations Bambet Non-compliance with laws Tivit Bet App Promoted illegal betting BetM Violation of local laws

Online Gaming Bill 2025: What happens to wallet money of PokerBaazi, MPL, Zupee and others

Parliament has passed the Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025 on August 21. The new bill, passed by both Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha places a blanket ban on real-money games online. It is designed to curb addiction, financial ruin and social distress caused by predatory gaming platforms that thrive on misleading promises of quick wealth. In 2025 alone, the government has banned multiple betting apps. Majority of these apps banned have allegedly been responsible for promoting unauthorized gambling activities on their platforms. Here’s a look at apps banned in India in 2025Other than these 5 apps, the central government banned 174 betting and gaming apps in December 2023. Some of the apps on the banned list then were Mahadev, Parimatch, Fairplay, 1XBET, Lotus365, Dafabet, and Betwaysatta.Most companies have confirmed that players’ funds are secure. MPL, Games24x7 (operator of My11Circle), PokerBaazi, and Zupee said withdrawals can be made smoothly, even though fresh deposits are blocked. WinZO said it will remove affected offerings from August 22, while Probo has already discontinued all money-related formats.
Article Summary: Parliament has passed the promotion and regulation of online gaming bill, 2025 on august 21. The new bill, passed by both lok sabha and rajya sabha places a blanket ban on real-money games online. In 2025 alone, the government has banned multiple betting apps.

Article Title: Flipkart launches premium membership program ‘Flipkart Black’ with YouTube premium subscription; know pricing, how to subscribe and more
Article Text:
Source: Flipkart

What is Flipkart Black Membership



Flipkart Black Membership pricing: How much does it cost



Flipkart Black Membership 2025: Here’s how to apply



Open the Flipkart app or website and navigate to the Flipkart Black product page.

Click Buy Now and complete payment at the listed price (Rs 990 or Rs 1,499).

Membership activates instantly and can be managed via My Account → Black Membership.

Flipkart Black Membership 2025 benefits



YouTube Premium 1 year subscription

Ad-free video streaming on YouTube and YouTube Kids.

Offline downloads, so videos can be watched without an internet connection.

YouTube Music access, giving members ad-free music streaming.

Exclusive discounts and Flipkart Black deals

Special discounts on premium electronics, gadgets, and lifestyle products.

Early access to major sales events, including seasonal promotions like Big Billion Days.

The ability to combine these deals with other bank offers or coupon discounts, maximisng savings.

SuperCoins cashback: Accelerated rewards

Travel benefits

Priority customer support

Reduced waiting times compared to regular users.

Direct access to human agents instead of automated chatbots.

Faster resolution for issues related to orders, refunds, and returns.

Simplified returns and exchanges

Free returns on eligible items.

Priority processing of refunds, with faster crediting to your account.

Hassle-free replacements for damaged or defective products.

Who should subscribe Flipkart Black Membership



Frequent Flipkart shoppers: Access to Black Deals, SuperCoins, and priority support saves time and money.

Heavy YouTube users: One-year free YouTube Premium offsets subscription cost.

Travellers: Re.1 flight change perk helps avoid costly cancellations.

Gadget and Premium Product Buyers: Early sale access ensures availability of in-demand items.

Flipkart Black 2025: Common FAQs



Does Flipkart Black include YouTube Premium?

What are Flipkart Black exclusive deals?

How much cashback do Flipkart Black members earn?

Can Flipkart Black help with travel bookings?

Is Flipkart Black subscription refundable?

How do I activate Flipkart Black benefits?

What is the difference between Flipkart Black and Flipkart Plus?

Do Flipkart Black members get priority support?

Also Read |

Flipkart has launched Flipkart Black in a bid to strengthen its premium offerings. This is a paid membership program designed to elevate the online shopping experience in India. The subscription combines exclusive deals, entertainment perks, travel benefits, and priority services, making it ideal for frequent shoppers and digital content enthusiasts. Flipkart Black is positioned as an upgrade over the free Flipkart Plus loyalty program, offering tangible benefits beyond standard discounts. With an annual fee of Rs 1,499 and a limited-time early-bird price of Rs 990, the subscription offers substantial value, including one year of free YouTube Premium, member-only deals, accelerated rewards, and more.Here is a detailed breakdown of each Flipkart Black benefit, pricing, activation, and comparison with other Flipkart and competitor offerings.Flipkart Black is Flipkart's premium paid membership program, offering a suite of exclusive benefits across shopping, entertainment, and travel. Designed to enhance the digital experience, it provides members with access to special deals, faster services, priority customer support, early access to sales, reward points, free or discounted shipping, and additional perks that go beyond the standard offerings, making it ideal for frequent online shoppers and lifestyle enthusiasts seeking convenience, savings, and enriched experiences.Flipkart Black is priced at Rs 1,499 per year. To encourage early adoption, the company has introduced a launch offer of Rs 990 for subscribers purchasing within the initial promotional period.The subscription activates immediately upon purchase and is non-refundable and non-cancellable, making it a commitment for the full year. Considering that the YouTube Premium subscription alone is valued at approximately Rs 1,490 per year, the early-bird price already offsets most of the subscription fee, leaving additional benefits like exclusive deals and rewards as added value.For YouTube Premium, click the benefit banner within the Black Membership page and follow the redirect to activate on your Google account.For travel benefits, log in to Cleartrip with the same phone number used for Flipkart Black and select the Re.1 option during flight booking.One of Flipkart Black’s headline benefits is a one-year subscription to YouTube Premium. This includes:The subscription is tied to a single Google account and must be activated through the Flipkart Black membership page. If a user already has an active YouTube Premium subscription, they need to either cancel it or use a different Google account. This feature is particularly valuable for users who consume video and music content regularly, effectively covering almost the entire subscription cost by itself.Flipkart Black members gain access to exclusive “Black Deals”, which are:By offering early access to sales and exclusive deals, Flipkart Black ensures that members can secure popular products before they run out of stock, giving them a competitive advantage over regular shoppers.Members earn 5% SuperCoins on every eligible purchase, up to a per-transaction limit of 100 coins. These coins can be redeemed like rupees for future Flipkart purchases. The SuperCoins program incentivizes frequent shopping, allowing users to accumulate rewards and save further on subsequent purchases.Flipkart Black also extends to travel benefits through Cleartrip. Members can access:Rs.1 flight cancellation and rescheduling, making it easier to change plans at minimal cost.Limited usage applies: typically one booking per year for up to two passengers.This perk is particularly useful for frequent travelers who value flexibility and want to avoid high cancellation fees.Black members are offered priority 24×7 customer support:This benefit is ideal for shoppers purchasing high-value items, ensuring smoother problem resolution.Flipkart Black simplifies returns and exchanges:This adds convenience and peace of mind for members who shop frequently or purchase premium products.Yes, Flipkart Black provides one year of free YouTube Premium with ad-free videos, background play, offline downloads, and YouTube Music access.Members get special discounts on premium electronics, gadgets, lifestyle products, and early access to major sales events.Members earn 5% SuperCoins on eligible purchases, up to 100 SuperCoins per transaction, which can be redeemed on future orders.Yes, members get Re.1 flight cancellation and rescheduling on Cleartrip bookings, offering flexibility for travel plans.No, the subscription is non-refundable and non-cancellable once purchased.After subscribing, members can activate YouTube Premium and travel perks through the Flipkart Black membership page on the app or website.Flipkart Plus is free and offers loyalty rewards, while Flipkart Black is paid, providing exclusive deals, YouTube Premium, early sale access, and travel benefits.Yes, members receive 24×7 priority customer support, with reduced wait times and direct access to human agents.
Article Summary: Flipkart black is a paid membership program designed to elevate the online shopping experience in india. The subscription combines exclusive deals, entertainment perks, travel benefits, and priority services. With an annual fee of rs 1,499 and a limited-time early-bird price of rs 990, the subscription offers substantial value, including one year of free youtube premium.

Article Title: Wordle today #1526: Get hints and answers to today's puzzle August 23, 2025
Article Text:
Wordle August 23, 2025: Today’s hints, clues, and answer

Wordle hints and answers today

Wordle hints and clues for August 23

The word starts with letter 'U'.

The word consists three vowels.

The word ends with letter 'N'.

The word has one repeating letter.

Today's Wordle word means a group of states or countries that have joined together to form one country or group.

Wordle, August 23, 2025: Word of the day

Today's Wordle word is 'UNION'.

How did Wordle originate

Where can you play Wordle





How to play Wordle

Wordle FAQs

No, Wordle is designed as a daily game with a unique puzzle each day. While you can’t play past puzzles on the official site, there are unofficial Wordle archives available where you can play previous games.

Green means the letter is correct and in the correct position.

Yellow means the letter is correct but in the wrong position.

Gray means the letter is not in the word at all.

You have six chances to guess the correct five-letter word. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt.

Wordle is designed as a daily puzzle, so you can only play one puzzle per day. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you’ll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle.

Yes, repeated letters can appear in Wordle answers. Words containing duplicate letters can present more of a challenge when solving.

Also Read | NYT Connections hints and answers today

Wordle is a popular word puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six attempts. Developed by Josh Wardle, this simple yet addictive game has taken the world by storm with its easy-to-understand rules and daily challenges. Each guess provides feedback with colored tiles: green indicates the correct letter in the correct spot, yellow signals the correct letter in the wrong spot, and gray means the letter isn't in the word. Wordle’s mix of logic and vocabulary makes it a daily brain teaser loved by millions worldwide. The game's minimalist design and once-a-day format have contributed to its viral success. It also fosters friendly competition, as players often share their results on social media without giving away the answer.The Wordle puzzle can be tricky to solve, which is likely why you’ve found yourself here, struggling to crack today’s challenge. As always, today’s NYT Wordle was full of surprises, but don’t worry—we’re here to help. Below, you’ll find some helpful clues for today’s Wordle answer, and if those don’t do the trick, keep reading to discover the solution directly. Sometimes the word includes uncommon letters or double letters that throw players off.Today’s Wordle promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's Wordle challenge.Whether you have cracked the code or are still working with the hints, it is now time to reveal the answer.Wordle was initially developed by engineer Josh Wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. However, it quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation with thousands of players engaging daily. The game's success inspired fans to create various spin-offs, such as the battle royale-style Squabble, the music identification game Heardle, and multi-word challenges like Dordle and Quordle. Its simplicity, paired with daily novelty, made it a part of many people's morning routine. The viral appeal also sparked academic interest in its psychological and linguistic impact.As its popularity soared, The New York Times acquired Wordle, and it became a hit on social media platforms like TikTok, where creators even livestream their gameplay sessions.Wordle isn't available as an app; it can only be played through a web browser. To play, simply visit the New York Times Games website.Originally hosted on its own site and created by Josh Wardle, Wordle was acquired by the New York Times in February of this year. One of the great aspects of Wordle is that it’s ad-free, allowing you to fully concentrate on the word-guessing game.To play Wordle, visit the link https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html and begin guessing words.Can I play past Wordle puzzles?How do the color-coded tiles work in Wordle?How many guesses do I get in Wordle?Can I play Wordle more than once per day?Can letters repeat in Wordle?Is Wordle available in other languages?Yes, there are multiple versions of Wordle available in various languages, including Spanish, French, and German. You can switch to a different language by finding the corresponding version of the game online.
Article Summary: Wordle is designed as a daily puzzle, so you can only play one puzzle per day. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you’ll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt. Wordle is an ad-free word-guessing game.

Thewill allow you to dominate the league with meta-relevant mons The Ultra League in Pokemon GO’s Delightful Days season has become one of the most competitive PvP formats, with a constantly shifting meta shaped by buffs, nerfs, and evolving player strategies. To climb the ranks under the 2500 CP cap, trainers need a team that balances bulk, coverage, and shield pressure.One of the best Pokemon GO Ultra League Team compositions dominating the current season features Bellibolt, Cradily, and Shadow Feraligatr.This season’s Ultra League meta rewards teams that can handle Flying and Water-heavy lineups while still checking Steel and Fairy cores. Pokemon with high energy generation and versatile coverage are performing exceptionally well, and bulky pivots remain essential for soaking up damage.Bellibolt’s fast energy gain, Cradily’s bulk, and Shadow Feraligatr’s closing power combine to counter a wide array of common threats, making them one of the most reliable trios for consistent success.This lineup ensures type synergy, coverage balance, and adaptability to the most frequent meta threats.These movesets maximize energy efficiency, shield pressure, and closing potential, giving the team an edge in most matchups.• Bellibolt as a Lead: Starts battles with fast energy, forces shields, and checks Flying and Water Pokemon effectively.• Cradily as a Safe Switch: With dual Rock/Grass typing and bulk, Cradily neutralizes many core meta Pokemon while absorbing charged moves.• Shadow Feraligatr as a Closer: With Hydro Cannon and Crunch, Feraligatr can sweep weakened teams, making it a lethal endgame threat.Together, these three create a cycle of shield pressure, energy control, and flexible coverage that punishes opponents’ mistakes.For Ultra League battles, Pokemon need carefully optimized IVs to maximize bulk while staying under the 2500 CP cap.• Bellibolt: Prioritize Defense and Stamina (e.g., 15/10/15) for survivability.• Cradily: Look for high bulk spreads to extend its safe switch utility.• Shadow Feraligatr: Benefits from higher Attack IVs, ensuring charged moves secure key knockouts.Balancing bulk and attack is critical for this team’s performance.According to PvPoke simulations and player data, this team consistently maintains strong win rates across the ladder, provided shields are managed carefully.• Bellibolt: Dominates Skarmory, Galarian Stunfisk, and Pelipper.• Cradily: Pressures bulky Waters and checks Fairies like Togekiss.• Shadow Feraligatr: Handles Azumarill, Poliwrath, and Steel-heavy cores.• Bellibolt: Ground-types like Garchomp and Grass-types such as Venusaur.• Cradily: Steel-types like Scizor and Bastiodon.• Shadow Feraligatr: Electric-types (Electivire) and Grass-types (Trevenant).Trainers should pivot intelligently and preserve shields for matchups where the weaknesses could be exploited.• Lead with Bellibolt: Apply early pressure and generate energy to force shield decisions.• Pivot to Cradily: Absorb damage and use its Rock/Grass coverage to counter switch-ins.• Save Shadow Feraligatr for the Endgame: Its raw damage output thrives against opponents with limited shields.• Shield Management: Protect Bellibolt to maintain early momentum or reserve shields for Feraligatr’s finishing potential.Move counting and baiting with charged moves can be the deciding factors in close matches.The Bellibolt, Cradily, and Shadow Feraligatr team stands out in the Delightful Days 2025 Ultra League meta for its balance of offense, defense, and coverage. By mastering shield management, smart pivoting, and charged move timing, trainers can use this trio to reliably climb the GBL ladder.Also read: Best Pokemon GO Great League Team (Delightful Days): Ideal Team Composition, Best Movesets, Wins, Losses, Performance Statistics, and More While other options like Shadow Gliscor, Pangoro, and Cobalion remain strong, this team provides one of the most consistent paths to victory this season.
Article Summary: Best ultra league team: bellibolt, cradily, and shadow feraligatr. Best pokemon go ultra league strategy guide: how to use this mons effectively. The ultra league in pokemon go’s delightful days season has become one of the most competitive pvp formats. One of the best pokemon go ultra league team compositions features bellibolt, cradily, and shadow feraligatr.

Article Title: After Sindoor, JeM begins drive for funds
Article Text:
India’s Agni-5 Missile Test Sparks Panic In Pakistan, Raises Global Concerns Over Regional Stability





JAMMU: After suffering major setbacks in Operation Sindoor, Pakistan-based Jaish-e-Muhammed (JeM) has launched a Rs 3.91 billion fundraising drive under the garb of building 313 mosques, mirroring Lashkar-e-Taiba's decentralisation model, security officials said.Backed by ISI, JeM is using digital wallets like EasyPaisa and Sadapay, controlled by founder Masood Azhar 's family, to bypass scrutiny by FATF. Several accounts are linked to Azhar's brother Talha Al Saif, son Abdullah Azhar, and other commanders.Over 250 wallets are reportedly active, with social media posters, videos and Azhar's letters urging donations. Officials said JeM aims to decentralise training camps and ensure long-term financing for ops.
Article Summary: Pakistan-based jaish-e-muhammed (jem) has launched a rs 3.91 billion fundraising drive under the garb of building 313 mosques. Jem is using digital wallets like easypaisa and sadapay, controlled by founder masood azhar's family.
